title: Turkey and vegetable pasta bake
ingredients: ['250g penne', '1 tbsp olive oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '375g minced turkey', '2 x 400g cans chopped tomatoes with herbs', '300g frozen, sliced green beans, thawed', '300g frozen broccoli florets, thawed and chopped', '150ml soured cream', '50g Parmesan, freshly grated', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper']
